Articles.Content:
Hi! I\'m KelMai from Switzerland and I LOVE KSP. It\'s games like this that excite me more than the newest FPS shooter. I think there are many like-minded people here!

I also just started my YouTube-Channel where I posted 4 videos about KSP already. If someone is interested, here\'s the link:

http://www.youtube.com/user/KelMaiGaming?feature=mhee

(I hope it\'s ok to shamelessly plug my channel here. Tell me if otherwise, I\'ll edit it)

I know i\'m not the best commentator (english is not my first language, and i\'ve never done anything like this before...), but I\'ll definitely keep making KSP videos. Also, it helps me practice my english speaking skills.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Hi KelMaiGaming and welcome to the KSP community.

I think youtube links are alright, what is against the rules though is plugging your own sites or any form of advertising/moneymaking, but you don\'t get anything from youtube.

KSP videos are popular, so you can expect many people here to take a look

:cheers:

welcome! if you need any help PM me!

Thanks guys! 'Nice forum you have there...'

Looking forward to having a lot more fun with KSP!
Welcome to the KSP forums, I hope you enjoy your stay!
